price: Celebra el nombre de tu Señor y conságrate a Él con total devoción.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
